description: Marika Bret, who lost 12 colleagues in the 2015 attack, says her guards received "detailed threats".
title: Charlie Hebdo: French magazine's head of HR 'forced out of home'
title_page: Charlie Hebdo: French magazine's head of HR 'forced out of home' - BBC News
maintext: "We have always refused to do so, not because it is prohibited - the law allows us to do so - but because there was a need for a good reason to do it, a reason which has meaning and which brings something to the debate," it said.
